page.title: 02Housing in the villages
page.content: The housing has not undergone many changes and the new houses and bungalows blend in well with the traditional black and white thatched cottages, so the villages have not lost their beauty.{ { {HOUSES WE LIVE IN. "Our house is old and made of wood and some brick. The roof is tiled. It has 8 rooms and 14 windows. It is about 600 years old and used to grind corn. It is an old granary." "I live in a detached house at the top of a lane. It is made of brick (rough cast) slates, guttering and glass. We are having an extension built so our kitchen is knocked down." "I live in a modern bungalow and we have a lot of garden, we have 5 acres. My dad teaches horticulture.
